name: .WHITEBOARD
summary: Learn about .WHITEBOARD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open WHITEBOARD files with Microsoft Whiteboard. The app is available on Windows, iOS, Android, and web platforms.
In Windows, click the Open existing whiteboard option or the “+” button, then select Import. On Web or iPad, select the Open or Import option.
Microsoft Whiteboard can convert WHITEBOARD files to .PNG images and .PDF documents. To do so, select the Settings menu (gear icon) and then click Export.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .whiteboard file in Microsoft Whiteboard 25
images.caption: WHITEBOARD file open in Microsoft Whiteboard 25
